name: I Got Isekaiâ€™d into a Shmup
description:
Choose to be one of the four pilots and hold the fate of this world in your hands!

Game Features:

-Playable for 1 to 4 players: Invite your friends for an intense cooperative experience!
- 4 game modes: Normal, Difficult, Maniac, and Boss Rush!.
- Explore 8 unique stage, each with its own challenges and secrets.
- Select from 4 ships with varied shooting styles.
- Unlock bonus scenes to delve deeper into the story.
- Collect and complete a mysterious bestiary.
- Aim high with 45 unlockable in-game achievements
- Compete against friends with scoreboards for each difficulty level.
- Support screen rotations, play as you like.
- And to top it all off, an epic soundtrack, fueled by custom-made instrumental metal! 

Get ready to dive into the action, dodge tons of bullets, and save this world teetering on the edge of chaos!
intro:
After an exhausting day, you return home with your new shmup in hand.... Black out!
You wake up in the midst of a space battle!
